ModMetaData.name: Signal Lost
ModMetaData.author: Higgs
ModMetaData.description:
A Lovecraftian horror event for RimWorld Anomaly. Discover grotesque flesh symbionts that actively hunt your colonists for parasitic bonding.
Features: - Flesh symbionts that appear as buried anomalies - Psychic compulsion system that forces colonists to approach - Parasitic bonding with powerful enhancements and terrible costs - Escalating hunger mechanics that make the symbiont more aggressive over time - Defensive behaviors when threatened - Full integration with Anomaly research systems
Warning: This mod contains body horror themes inspired by Dead Space and Lovecraftian fiction.
Developed with assistance from Claude AI (Anthropic).
